content: Tamannaah Bhatia has a girl-next-door appeal. Her wardrobe is jam-packed with comfortable, breezy and ultra-stylish outfits. Let’s take a look at her off-duty fashion.
title: Tamannaah Bhatias off-duty looks

content: Tara Sutaria never misses a chance to show her bold styling prowess and we aren’t even complaining! Whenever the star is dressed in one of her favourite bodycon outfits, we are left in awe! And these sassy looks definitely have our attention. Swipe away to watch.
title: Tara Sutaria in sassy body fit dresses
